mapper.select: SELECT APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, MOD_YN, ATCH_NO, REQ_ST, APRV_AUTH, DEADLINE, IMPTS FROM APRV WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND NOT REQ_ST = '임시저장' AND REQ_ST = #{reqSt} ORDER BY APRV_NO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(APRV_NO) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(APRV_NO) + 1 END AS NO FROM APRV
INSERT INTO APRV (APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, CNTN, ATCH_NO, REQ_ST, APRV_AUTH, APRV_ETC, DEADLINE, IMPTS) VALUES (#{aprvNo}, #{empNo}, #{ttl}, TIMESTAMP, #{cntn}, #{atchNo}, '전송', #{aprvAuth}, #{aprvEtc}, #{deadline}, #{impts} )

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(FORM_NO) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(FORM_NO) + 1 END AS NO FROM FORM
INSERT INTO FORM (FORM_NO, TTL, CNTN, FORM_CAT, EMP_NO, FORM_AUTH) VALUES (#{formNo}, #{ttl}, #{cntn}, #{formCat}, #{empNo}, #{formAuth})
